title: "Health researchers use artificial intelligence to better predict hepatitis C treatment outcomes"
excerpt: "When hepatitis C treatments fail, patients can face major health risks and the expense of a second therapy. Now, University of Florida Health researchers have developed algorithms that use artificial intelligence to accurately predict when treatment won't work."
